product.title: I'm Not Tired Embroidered Patch
product.description: If only this was true for adults too. Either way, your kid will love it. This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. Size: 3.5" Color: Orange
product.descriptionHtml:
If only this was true for adults too. Either way, your kid will love it. 

This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

Size: 3.5" 

Color: Orange
